author: perrotta
body:
#### PR description:

Following the [comments](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41589#pullrequestreview-1455120036) posted during the review of #41589, rather than writing a github issue about them I coded here the cleanups that I suggested for the package.

@OlivieFranklova

#### PR validation:

The code compiles, and a few relevant workflows run without errors.
Of course, outputs must be identical to the ones before these code cleanings: if it will not be so there is a problem
title: Cleaning code recently added to RecoLocalCalo/HGCalRecProducers
